import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Container, Table, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import SocieteServices from "../../Services/SocieteServices" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { FiInfo } from 'react-icons/fi' export default function SocieteComponent({ parentCallback }) { const [societes, setSocietes] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { localStorage.removeItem("employe") parentCallback("") SocieteServices.getSocietes().then(societes => { setSocietes(societes); console.log(societes) }) }, [parentCallback]) return (
{/* */} { societes.map((societe, index) => ( )) }
# Nom Passer Commande Verifier Commande Détails
{index + 1} {societe.rsoc}
) }
